scripts.postinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget --no-install-recommends && apt-get install -y ca-certificates fonts-liberation libappindicator3-1 libasound2 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libatk1.0-0 libcups2 libdbus-1-3 libgbm1 libgtk-3-0 libnspr4 libnss3 libx11-xcb1 lsb-release xdg-utils --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
